sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const SummaryBtn = ({ completedTasks, uncompletedTasks, totalTasks })=> { return (

Completed Tasks

Bravo! You've accomplished {completedTasks} tasks and collected 13 well-deserved stars. Your determination and success are truly inspiring!

Uncompleted Tasks

Keep going! There are {uncompletedTasks} tasks waiting for your attention. With your dedication, you'll soon conquer them all and shine even brighter!

Number of Tasks : {totalTasks}

) } export default SummaryBtn
